law.catch_line: Access for review and audit of hub operator -- Audited financial statements.
law.text: The racing commission or its staff shall, upon request, be given access, for review and audit, to all records and financial information of the hub operator, including all account information. The racing commission may require that the hub operator annually submit to the racing commission audited financial statements.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 490, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 7, effective July 13, 2004.
